name: A New Star Cluster★Shining BIGBANG!
intro_lines: Trickstar accepts a job from Eichi to introduce Ensemble Square. However, Subaru's been acting off. With Subaru himself not knowing why he feels this way, Mao searches for the cause of Subaru's discomfort.

name: SHUFFLE × √ of Love is AtoZ
intro_lines: Chiaki's been instructed to form a shuffle unit with some others, and getting members who might know how to come up with date plans isn't easy. Kaoru's been acting off, too...

name: Intersecting／Motor Show
intro_lines: Ryuseitai N and ALKALOID are scheduled to perform together, but Tetora is concerned about how he should act as a leader unto Ryuseitai N. With the help of Shinobu and Midori, Tetora tries to figure out how to guide the new, junior members of Ryuseitai N now that Chiaki and Kanata are no longer there.

name: Spring Thunder✳︎Tempest of Glorious Song
intro_lines: As their individual work is increasing, Tori wishes for work as Fine. In those circumstances, Yuzuru also seems absentminded, and so he decides to consult with Eichi and company...

name: Discord ◆ Internal Conquest
intro_lines: Hiyori becomes furious at the Cospro event plan themed: 'Eden splits, and Adam and Eve face off!' He refuses work for Eden, and Nagisa declares he is expelled...

name: Partake／Night Club
intro_lines: Yuuta worries over how he is seen as a member of 2wink and how he is seen individually. It is in these circumstances that he spots Hinata, who was being brought along by Rinne, go into a 'grown-up' establishment...

name: Resume＊Showing Growth with a High Five!
intro_lines: Ra*bits is enthusiastic about Nazuna’s comeback live. However, the live becomes in danger of being cancelled. Tomoya goes to Nazuna to apologize, but...

name: Learning from the Past／Succession Match
intro_lines: When they were little, Keito and Rei watched a TV show called "Vampire Shogun." As Rhythm Link was involved in its production, talk began of using it in the renewal performane for a live house, and...

name: Debut! Awakened Night Patrollers
intro_lines: Kohaku is gathering information under certain circumstances. As he his following the clues, he encounters Madara, who is suspicious. He learns that Leo is connected to the person Kohaku is after, and...

name: Advancing to the Future／Next Door
intro_lines: Tsumugi seems to be overworked from handling the agency's matters. Leo is worried about him, and the severity of the state that NewDi is in causes Leo to recall his own past experience with hardship.

name: Descent! The Neverland We Begin to Spin
intro_lines: Shu has returned to Japan in preparation for the 'Japan Neverland Cup', a festival for artistic musicians. Mika had also been making preparations for Shu's return, but he reaches an impasse in his work.

name: Heat Haze ◆ Remnants of Summer and Hot Limit
intro_lines: Rinne proudly announces to the members of Crazy:B, who are killing time in Cafe Cinnamon, that he's gotten them an official job. But Niki has a situation of his own, and the memories of when he first met Rinne come back to him.

name: Fight to the Death on the Silver Screen／Fist of the Shangri-la Idol!
intro_lines: It comes to be that auditions will be held for the lead role in a kung fu movie, and Trickstar will participate. At the audition venue, fine will judge the acting, but...

name: Envy ♦︎ The Feather-Light Brush of Small Wings
intro_lines: Aira is feeling down about errors during lives and the difference in ability between him and the other members in practice. Tatsumi, who sees him struggling to bridge the difference between his ideal and reality, confides in him about his own worries.

name: Howl! Nightless City That Burns the Soul
intro_lines: Koga doesn't seem to be doing very well. Kaoru tries to talk to him, but Koga absolutely refuses him. At both seniors' request, Adonis casually asks Koga about what's going on. It turns out the Live House is the source.

name: Variety and Tag／Bogie Time!
intro_lines: Nagisa's decision causes Eden to accept a performance in a variety show that they had been avoiding, and the scheduling is driving Ibara up the wall. On top of that, Hiyori and Nagisa cause the script to be changed, and thus Eden ends up forming pairs with Ra*bits, who have been chosen as their costars.

name: SHUFFLE × The Veil of Darkness and the Butlers
intro_lines: As part of the cross agency plan, Makoto and the others arrive at the chalk white mansion to film a movie. The filming seems to be going well, but Izumi's fastidiousness results in retakes. They lodge together while trying to get into character.

name: SHUFFLE × White Snow's Merry Xmas
intro_lines: Tori and others are gathered for the Shuffle Unit project. However, the project manager goes missing. They end up having to plan the project themselves, but some minor things cause Tori to feel concerned about how Aira is doing...

name: Transform! The Comet Show Connecting the Stars
intro_lines: Ryuseitai is reorganized in accordance with orders from their agency. Rysueitai M and Ryuseitai N are fused and end up as Ryuseitai and other separate squads, but then Chiaki and the others announce that they will be withdrawing after their next live...

name: Beyond! Resonating Twin Peaks
intro_lines: 2wink, who both reconcile with each other and disagree. They are asked by Ibara to perform in a music program which is considered one of the stepping stones for advancement. However, there is only a slot for one performer, and...

name: Revealing Hidden Treasures／Antique Legend
intro_lines: An antique market took place near ES. However, Double Face, who sensed something suspicious about it, unilaterally challenge Valkyrie to a showdown, attempting to get them to give up information...

name: One Battle! The Pride-Showing Unification by Force
intro_lines: Souma encountered Kuro and Keito arguing. It ended without him hearing the reason for the fight, but he hears around that Akatsuki’s position in the office is in danger, and...

name: Daydream＊Slumbering Euthanasia
intro_lines: Izumi and Tsukasa argue about the direction Knights should take. Ritsu, seeing it did not seem it would come to a conclusion, suggested trial by combat, and intended that it be a match that also sent the loser to a “happy death.”

name: Projection★The Magic Lantern That Reflects the Heart
intro_lines: Subaru and Sora, who found a machine-like thing in the courtyard of the Seisoukan. Sora brings it to Natsume as a topic of conversation, but it seems he is not very interested, and...

name: Chocolat♥︎Primavera of Fluttering Sweet Breezes
intro_lines: Chocolat Festival was planned to be held, but it is jeopardized by certain circumstances. Eichi and Yuzuru decide to hide the situation, but Tori is concerned, and...

name: SS Arc／1st Stage Satellite
intro_lines: The preliminaries for the SS begin, and Trickstar and Alkaloid each head for a venue in Hokkaido. However, for some reason, Trickstar is wandering through a jungle, and...

name: Wander! Black Bunny in UNDERLAND
intro_lines: Ra*bits were holding off on having a meeting about their next live. However, a ball comes flying at Mitsuru, who had finished his club activities, and hits him directly, making him lose his memories...

name: Assault! The Labyrinth Bound by Ariadne's Thread
intro_lines: The members of Crazy:B head to a neighboring city for a location shoot. However, upon arrival, they find themselves in a labyrinth. Ibara explains that they are now part of a challenging variety show filled with rewards and punishments...

name: SS Arc／2nd Stage Submarine
intro_lines: As AKATSUKI members arrive in Okinawa for the Qualifying Rounds of SS, they find themselves surrounded by local idols. RYUSEITAI, too, is caught up in the chaos. Constrained by the "order" they've been given, everyone's trying hard to find solutions and escape the predicament.

name: SHUFFLE × The Ring That Sounds the Bells
intro_lines: Mao and Midori spot their Producer entering a bookstore after school, excitely picking up and purchasing a wedding magazine. They can't help but wonder if their Producer is planning to tie the knot...

name: SS Arc／3rd Stage Secret Service
intro_lines: Having earned seed privileges as the runner-up of last year's SS, Eden is enjoying their time in Kyushu. However, they notice a code sent by Madara, who is currently working as MaM. Ibara heads to Shikoku alone, but waiting there is...

name: Aroma＊Veiled Fragrance
intro_lines: Arashi's favorite perfume brand invites Knights to collaborate on the development of a new fragrance. However, Arashi hesitates when it comes to accepting the offer from this esteemed brand. Meanwhile, it appears that Akiomi has also been using a perfume from this very same brand...

name: SS Arc／4th Stage SHINSEKAI -STRANGE NEW WORLD-
intro_lines: At Switch's proposal, the Tohoku region preliminaries hold a play-off to determine their winner -- following a set of unique rules. Valkyrie seizes victory, but the following day, when they head outside, they are greeted by the sight of a jungle, and a miniature Sora appears before them.

name: SS Arc／5th Stage Sandstorm
intro_lines: Undead and 2wink are participating in the Chuukoku region's preliminaries... But when Hinata awakens in the morning, he finds himself in a desert. Kaoru comes by on a surfboard, seeking out "Desert Coins".

name: SHUFFLE × Moonlight Mirror Ball
intro_lines: The Shuffle Project this time is themed after Kaguya-hime as a tie-in with a popular educational TV program. The five members plan to lodge together, but they can't seem to get in sync. It's then when Hiyori reveals a secret to the other members...

name: SS Arc／6th Stage Sanctuary
intro_lines: Ra*bits and fine were participating in the Kanto preliminaries. Tomoya wakes up from a nightmare and finds himself not at the inn he was staying at, but in an unknown alleyway. Confused, he looks around, only to find an unconscious Wataru...

name: Beating Wings ◆ The Cloud-Scattering Solid Stage
intro_lines: During work as Eden, Jun lost himself for a moment and made a mistake. Upon realizing that he doesn't seem able to bounce back any time soon, Ibara gathers the Eden members to plan a drastic change for their upcoming new song.

name: SS Arc／7th Stage Sudden Death
intro_lines: Knights and Crazy:B shared information among themselves during the Kansai preliminaries. At first it seems that the prelims are going as usual, just like in other areas, but one day the ES idols' orders are made public, putting them into dire straits.

name: Eternal Oni ◆ Scarlet Halloween
intro_lines: Akatsuki is planning to participate in ES's Halloween event when RhythLink requests for them to be in their own live show on the same day. Meanwhile, Souma is preparing for the Halloween Party at Yumenosaki Academy...

name: Depths＊The Beast Laying Hidden Beneath
intro_lines: As per Koga's suggestion, UNDEAD decides to take part in a suspense and romance drama. As they get into character, they find out that the script is incomplete, and the romance between the protagonist and culprit is still unresolved...

name: In a Pinch!? ☆ Pierce It In Half! Ninja Clan
intro_lines: Mao tells Shinobu that Ninja Association will have its activities suspended. Shinobu consults with Tetora and Midori, but they can't come up with a foolproof solution. With no progress being made, Tetora suggests to go back to the basics.

name: SHUFFLE × The Numbing Noir Neige
intro_lines: The five of them were able to secure cast roles in the movie's audition. However, Ritsu is conflicted about working together with Rei. Rei seems distant all throughout the shooting, but confused as they may be, the other members continue with their roles...

name: SS Arc／Final Stage SS
event_gacha: Tiger of the Fifth Earth Star
intro_lines: As they near the SS performance, Red Team's fine and White Team's Eden attend a special program as the leaders of their teams. With everyone's respective motives, and a plan secretly in the works, anticipation rises as New Year's Eve approaches…

name: Focus＊Seasons Through The Viewfinder
intro_lines: Trickstar tries to brainstorm what their next song should be, but Mao is struggling to come up with an idea for it. That's when he hears that the big cherry blossom tree in the field is going to be cut down...

name: Voyage ◆ The Phantom Airship that Sails Across Hearts
intro_lines: ALKALOID is chosen by Switch to be the test runners for their new SSVRS stage, The Phantom Airship. They were told it was a practice stage suitable for a novice unit, but a trial awaits them there...

name: Chocolat♥Love Letter Covered in Hearts
intro_lines: 2wink learn of the predicament that ChocoFes is in. As one of the school's strongest units, they decide to come up with an event proposal themselves. However, what they thought would be a breeze turns increasingly into a disagreement...

name: Shine▲Polyhedric Tri-Lights
intro_lines: One of Switch's earliest proposals is set in motion after much time has passed, which puzzles Natsume. Sora convinces the others to take up the challenge, but they're asked to show off a "sporty" side instead of their usual magician theme..

name: Sprout＊Waning Hermitage
intro_lines: Shu returns from Paris with a doll as a souvenir. He and Mika split their work on their new MV, but they struggle with the "doll" motif. Mika, unsure how to be doll-like, confesses his worries to the doll he received, and starts having strange dreams...

name: First Bloom＊A Spring Evening's Brief Respite
intro_lines: Kohaku is called to the office by Ibara. He expects behind-the-scenes work, but he's asked to make a normal live proposal. He asks Hinata for advice, and finds Madara during a meeting to tell him that he wants to go to the arcade...

name: SHUFFLE × Easter to You☆
intro_lines: The springtime event Easter Night has been renewed as Easter Festival. Shinobu and the others learn that there will be a shuffle unit performing. Hinata requests that they form a unit among themselves, but he also wants to include a certain person...

name: Reminiscence＊The Obbligato Played by Iridescence
intro_lines: CosPro has organized a project named COMP to revitalize its schools. As their students, Eden, Tatsumi, and HiMERU gather to perform. With the theme of school memories, Jun realizes that HiMERU isn't quite the same as he once was...

name: Attack! The Solitary Battle of the VS GAME
intro_lines: Makoto is glad when Trickstar is chosen to promote a new game, "VS", and decides to have a let's play showdown with Hokuto. He begins without a hitch, but Hokuto struggles as a noob. Everyone thinks Makoto will stay in the lead, but...

name: Wedding Speech＊Strumming Bride Light
intro_lines: Kaoru is troubled. Adonis notices that he's unable to talk to anyone about it and offers to lend an ear, but it doesn't go well. Adonis, thinking that the problem can't be solved by Kaoru alone, decides to gather the other UNDEAD members.

name: Halo of Enlightenment◆Black Paradise Flycatcher Looking to the Skies
intro_lines: Souma learns from Nazuna that Keito thought of going to college last year. Talking to Keito, he realizes that he can choose a path other than being an idol, so he starts pouring his heart into his studies.

name: Yumenosaki Divided／The Tanabata Festival that Bridges Hope
intro_lines: After the success of last year's Tanabata Festival, the producer proposes it again this year. However, Mao tells her they have a problem: Hitsugi's blank proposal has caused him to be threatened by the "Peace Party".

name: Voyage! The Cruise That Meets The Sea
intro_lines: Tsumugi accepts a job on a tropical island because he feels like Switch hasn’t been able to do many summer activities. After convincing Natsume to join him, it seems Switch can take a break, until they realize they're stuck on the island...

name: Summer Breeze! Sunshine Dazzling in a Foreign Land
intro_lines: Tsukasa calls Leo, who returned to Japan before Izumi. Leo sounds dejected, explaining that he's in a slump and can't write music. According to him, he's tired from working nonstop and he complains that he needs a break.

name: Battle of Yumenosaki! The Sports Festival to Declare Your Presence
intro_lines: A three-day long "Old-Fashioned Sports Festival" is to be held. Unlike the Sports Festivals of previous years, this time the students of Yumenosaki will compete by representing their agencies. Aira becomes the leader of Team Starpro, but he's about to be crushed under all the pressure…

name: SHUFFLE × Festival of the Blazing War Dance
intro_lines: In order to promote the mixed martial arts program CROSS FIRE, Madara and them form a shuffle unit full of muscle men who take pride in their physical strength. As the members gather, Tetora proposes a certain competition to prove that Kuro is the strongest man in Yumenosaki.

name: Fantasy♠Playing Cards in UNDERLAND
intro_lines: When Hiiro is asked about the future of ALKALOID, he's unable to come up with an answer. This is deemed unacceptable by his agency, and he is ordered to find a way to make up for it. In search of his answer, he applies to perform in a live themed after Alice in Wonderland…

name: Wandering Yumenosaki／School Trip to the Mainland!
intro_lines: Mitsuru and the others are to visit Australia for their school trip. While the first group to depart stay at a high-class hotel and enjoy a luxurious holiday, the other group are taken to an unknown village at the northmost point of the country.

name: Faint Shadow＊Ghostic Halloween
intro_lines: Yuzuru and the others are quite motivated for the ES Halloween. fine plans to open a top-notch haunted house at ES; however, inexplicable phenomena keep happening one after another within the house—

name: Desire for Mischief◆Spider Halloween
intro_lines: Crazy:B ends up joining the ES Halloween Event. Kohaku who finds it as a mere childish event, steps inside a haunted house notorious for being eerie with the members of Crazy:B.

name: SHUFFLE × A Cup of Rest and Cafeteria
intro_lines: Shu hears from Tsumugi that his favourite cafe is in danger of closing up shop. In order to protect his place of relaxation, he looks for a way to help the cafe survive.

name: Vowing Yumenosaki／The Final Mystery and StarFes
intro_lines: Preparations begin for the Starlight Festival, Yumenosaki's final event of the year. It seems like it'll be a peaceful Christmas event, but Shinobu worries as Mayoi is nowhere to be found…

name: SHUFFLE × The Unknown Holy Night and Nighthead!
intro_lines: Tomoya is happy when he is notified that he'll be in a shuffle unit with familiar members. However, he discovers that the actual unit is a band of strange upperclassmen led by Rinne...!?
song_name: Have you been naughty or nice?

name: Vision＊Painting A New Scenery • NEW COLOR
intro_lines: When the President of New Dimension said he would 'grant him any wish', Madara makes a request for work as MaM. He heads to a building deep in the mountains with the Producer, not knowing what he was supposed to do there, but…

name: Members of Society☆Off to a New Start GO!
intro_lines: Ra*bits is participating in the planning of a "Work Experience at a Menswear Company" project. Riding crowded trains, they struggle deeply with the unfamiliar work. Hajime appears to be worried about a newbie at work…

name: Colored Stars! The Universe that Encompasses All
intro_lines: An accident during training created a rift within RYUSEITAI. Half a year later, news broke that Tetora had left the unit to become the leader of a new group…?

name: Chocolat◆An Exceptional Rouge and Ruby
intro_lines: ES will be holding its own Chocolat Fes from this year onwards. Wanting to show off Eden's authority, Ibara announces that they will also be performing on stage as Adam & Eve.

name: Originality◆The Corridor of Machina Going Ahead
intro_lines: Distraught over what to do for a new performance, Mika looks to those around him for inspiration for ideas. When Makoto and Sora introduce him to SSVRS' newly established "Test World", he quickly gets immersed in the world of VR.

name: Beyond Turbulent Dreams／A Graduation Standing With You
intro_lines: At Repayment Festival, now known as White Chocolat Fes, the students have been told "—After this school year, Yumenosaki will effectively be shut down. While Subaru is a proponent, Hokuto is opposed to this. They each assert their differing viewpoints on the subject, but…

name: Expression of Gratitude! The Ebb and Flow of the Big Ocean
intro_lines: Hinata is planning a performance for the upcoming Repayment Festival. Yuta is participating too, and they start going all out in preparations. However, they discover that Repayment Festival has been changed to White Chocolat Fes this year…

name: Origin★Singing the Starry Sky Altered
intro_lines: "OO (Double O)"— the decisive battle to determine the strongest "temporary" unit—will be held over several days. It's based on a proposal Natsume once drew up, one that nobody should have known the contents of…

name: One Drop＊A Specially Chosen Mad Party In UNDERLAND
intro_lines: The newcomers of Knights are auditioning to perform in the much-talked-about event, "UNDERLAND". Upon learning that a fashion designer he admires will be working on the outfits for the event, Izumi offers to audition himself…

name: Bridegroom Training?／Wedding March!
intro_lines: After the PV they filmed gets shelved, Chiaki and Jun decide to plan their own bridal-themed project. They embark on a "bridal field trip" with other members willing to join them for the project.

name: SUGOROKU Trip! The BGM is Number Eight
intro_lines: Rinne and the others head over to their first overseas shoot after they're approached and invited by the producer to appear on the once popular show, "Number Eight". Determined by the roll of the Crazy:B dice, the road trip left up to fate begins―

name: Infinity★Parallel World of Our Potential
intro_lines: As the leader of Ra*bits, Tomoya worries whether or not he’s contributing properly to the unit. One day, Ra*bits is summoned by "Bishoujo-senpai", a big name in their agency…

name: Squeeze☆Tropical Paradise Filled With Love
intro_lines: As RYUSEITAI Black's activities came to an end, it was time to choose a leader for the next live "R2". It's decided that Midori will be in charge of RYUSEITAI this time, but the mascot character he's attached to announces they're taking an indefinite break…

name: Cooking Showdown／Drifting? Island
intro_lines: ES idols happen to be chosen to appear on a popular cooking show that is being revived for a single night only. Niki and Nazuna, who have been selected as their agency’s representatives, end up traveling around the mountains and sea in order to procure cooking ingredients.

name: Guardians◆Eye and Last Mission
intro_lines: Madara pays Kohaku a visit, saying that there is an emergency. Accompanied by a mysterious boy with apparent ties to Double Face, Madara requests Kohaku's help to protect the child.

name: The Blue Sea＊Sparkling True Atlantis
intro_lines: ES is trying to begin a new project called Project-ATLANTIS. Eichi wants to leave a part of the project in Tori's hands, but Tori is concerned about the elections for the next student council president…

name: Remplacer＊The Speaking Doll and Raison d'être
event_gacha: The Heartbeat of the Sea – Look back –
intro_lines: Mika makes his way to Paris after Shu tells him he wants to talk about the future. Upon hearing Mika's intent following graduation, Shu grows enraged. That's when news comes that Shu's grandfather has passed away. The two return to Japan to confirm the truth, however…

name: Riddle・Solution／Escape Mansion
intro_lines: Koga and Tsukasa are offered a chance to appear on the hot and trendy escape game variety show, Escape Mansion. They get fired up upon hearing the winner gets a luxurious prize. Aiming for victory, the two split into teams to solve the riddles.

name: Two Sides◆2×2 of Lies And Truth
intro_lines: 2wink's long-awaited namesake show, "2×2 (Squared)" has begun! The two pair up with their own respective "friends" and play against one another in a variety of matches, but Yuta seems to be concerned about Hinata’s relationship with the producer…

name: Dawning Night＊Holistic Halloween
intro_lines: ALKALOID continues to grow steadily after performing live after live. Tatsumi is put in charge of a live and tries to incorporate parts of an episode he had from his hospitalization into the project, but the project itself is based on a supernatural incident…

name: An Earnest Swordfight／Chanbara Night
intro_lines: Set at a traditional Japanese inn, Mao and Ritsu are chosen to appear on the competitive variety show, CHANCE×BASARA×NIGHT. With the survival of the inn on the line, the two are pit against one another as they confront the owner and his son, whom have clashing opinions on the matter.

name: Split Paths＊The Admired Figure and Flashback
intro_lines: UNDEAD participates in a "certain experiment" and relive memories of the past. There, the events that led to the formation of UNDEAD unfold, but it slightly differs from what Rei and Koga remember…

name: Sublimation＊The Grand Stage of the Rumbling Heavens and Earth
intro_lines: AKATSUKI is given the opportunity to host the educational program "The Rumbling Heavens and Earth". Keito vows to bring something new to the table and leave their mark on this long-running program, but the program's advisors, "The Three Sages", stand in their way…!?

name: Gift★Xday for the Children!
intro_lines: Hokuto receives a "secret base" as a Christmas present from Seiya. As Hokuto and the others deliberate over what to use it for, a mysterious client appears and requests: "I want you to find my father."

name: The Probing Roll of Dice／War Atop the Sugoroku Board
intro_lines: COS PRO and NEW DI end up participating in an agency competition variety show that will be streamed on NETV. Ibara and Natsume work out their strategies as they take on the challenge in "Open World Sugoroku".

name: Reverb★Stella Maris Crossing the Sea's Horizon
intro_lines: It's finally Kanata's turn to be captain. The other members are bewildered with Kanata's unique practice methods and the job description shrouded in mystery. That's when Kanata suddenly announces that they’re going to head to Okinawa to film a commercial…

name: Chocolat△A Candy House Of Your Eyes
intro_lines: NEW DIMENSION will partner with a major game company to progress their VR endeavors. Sora dives into the newly-created virtual world, "Candy House", and is sought for help by a "friend" he meets there.

name: Feelings I Want To Answer／Adorable Plum Blossoms Covered in Snow
intro_lines: Mayoi is at risk of repeating a grade due to lack of event attendance. At a loss, Hajime helps him out and they look for members for a temporary unit to shoot a PV for a hotel, but it's snowing out of season…

name: Into Paradise＊The Absolute of Immaculate Desire
intro_lines: Summoned by Gatekeeper, Nagisa and the others visit America. They are asked to perform as the Japanese representative at the idol festival "Absolute"; a festival that had been observed by Eden back when it first formed…

name: Crowned◆Gambit of Determination
event_gacha: The Blink of the Eye and Exhibition
intro_lines: Spring, during ES' first year of establishment. Receiving applications from new students to join the unit, Tsukasa is very motivated as the new "King". Things seemed to be going smoothly, however, a counterfeit Knights look-alike appears, and the situation takes an unexpected turn—

name: Double-Headed×Style／Dragon's Head
intro_lines: A weekly magazine comes out with rumors that STAR PRO and Rhyth Lin are on bad terms. While they assumed the commotion would subside on its own, the rift between fans only grows deeper and deeper… In an attempt to resolve the situation, Tetora and Kuro come up with an event to show off the bond between the two agencies.

name: Answer★Matrix of Stars Drawn Towards One Another
intro_lines: ALKALOID and Crazy:B are to face off in Matrix, a major event held by ES. To garner attention to this sibling face-off, Hiiro and Rinne end up exchanging the units they each lead.

name: SHUFFLE×Whispering Evil TELEPHONE
intro_lines: Spring, during ES' second year of establishment. Natsume and the others, who have been selected for the new shuffle project P Choice, will be taking on a job called The Case of the Devil. Hokuto was determined to successfully handle the case for the producer, but…

name: Audition VS PRINCESS -First piece-
intro_lines: The "4piece" audition program has finally begun! Assigned to the first venue called Prince Castle, Mao and Leo will team up with the other competitors to take on the challenge of "holding The Best Ball" in a week's time.

name: Romance★A SWING NIGHT to Sing Along To
event_gacha: A Droplet of a Flower／Dignified Cold
intro_lines: UNDEAD is living a busy day-to-day life on the upswing. One day, the media storms the dormitory when reports flood in that "Adonis has a girlfriend". And in the midst of the commotion, Adonis makes the announcement that he doesn't "have a girlfriend, but a fiancée"—?!

name: Innermost Feelings＊Timbres of Heaven That Joins Two Together
intro_lines: Hinata had taken on a job with a famous photographer in Yuta's place, who was not feeling well. As he had stolen away a valuable opportunity, Hinata suggests Yuta audition for one of the two lead roles of the youth romance drama, "Timbres of Heaven", however—

name: Audition VS GOURMET -Second piece-
intro_lines: It's the high-profile "4piece" audition program! Chiaki and Mitsuru are assigned to the second venue "Gourmet Town", where each person is given a restaurant and challenged to a "Restaurant Management Competition". First, they each try their hand at the recipe challenge, but…

name: Scent of Summer! Yellow Summer Sparkle
intro_lines: ALKALOID visits Paris to tour an upcoming event. While thoroughly enjoying their time off, they were made to change their accommodations due to some trouble. They head over to Aira's grandparent's house, but their main problem is that Aira seems reluctant to go…

name: SHUFFLE×Ballade of the Eternally Lost Ones
intro_lines: The group is chosen to star in a movie as part of the P-Choice project. The director is someone whom Yuzuru and Niki had saved from a certain incident, which led to them being chosen to co-star in the movie. However, acting as a "non-human" role is not so easy…

name: Audition VS AUDIENCE -Third piece-
intro_lines: It's the high-profile "4piece" audition program! Wataru and Izumi are assigned to the third venue "Twin Rooster Pagoda". To take part in the live judging on the final day, it is crucial to make a good impression on the "Audience of a Hundred" that changes out daily, and…?

name: Night Out★An Ephemeral Festival of Revelry
intro_lines: Upon the start of the new fiscal year, Crazy:B receives a surge in work. Behind it all is a massive boom centered around HiMERU and Kohaku, who have come to be known as the PBB (Pastel Bee Brothers), the both of them receiving unusual attention from the public…

name: Full Speed◆Chase Cheshire in WILDLAND
event_gacha: Song of the Hesitant Waning Moon – Look back –
intro_lines: RYUSEITAI has been selected for WILDLAND, a large-scale event inspired by Alice in Wonderland. Tetora, as the acting captain, thoroughly struggles to depict a wild worldview of devastation where all order has been lost.

name: Audition VS GLADIATOR -Fourth piece-
intro_lines: It's the high-profile "4piece" audition program! Jun and Sora are assigned to the fourth venue, "The Arena." They strive to become “The Strongest Gladiator” in the venue, which is said to be a miniature version of the idol industry, but the idols each have something on their mind, troubling them…

name: forgotten＊A Fairy Tale Left Half-read
intro_lines: Eichi watches over Tori at his side as he works on the construction plan for ATLANTIS. Tori completes his project proposal after finding inspiration from a certain book he comes across, but this proposal brings out an emotional reaction from Eichi.

name: The Howling Forest★Lupine Halloween
intro_lines: Keeping up the momentum, Madara is eager to take a new step forward with MaM. As he thinks about doing a big project together with the producer, of whom he has a complicated relationship with, he discovers a proposal that was rejected the year prior…

name: Build! FREEDOM Packed with Ideals!
intro_lines: As their first job of the new fiscal year, Trickstar will be taking part in Urban Development Plan: FREEDOM. Makoto becomes addicted to this simulation game, where you live in a fictional town and develop it, but…

name: Melting Heart＊Snow White of Memories
intro_lines: Esupuri's first job following their formation will be to advertise sweets from the "Princess Series". However, during an interview with the confectionery maker, Yume causes a big problem.
